vote.title: Authorize an eighteen-month service contract for a fleet electrification study, greenhouse gas inventory update, and a renewable natural gas study with Alliance for Sustainable Energy, LLC - Not to exceed $220,000 - Financing: General Fund ($200,000) and Equipment and Fleet Management Fund ($20,000) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize an eighteen-month service contract for a fleet electrification study, greenhouse gas inventory update, and a renewable natural gas study with Alliance for Sustainable Energy, LLC - Not to exceed $220,000 - Financing: General Fund ($200,000) and Equipment and Fleet Management Fund ($20,000) (subject to annual appropriations)
